price: 8. Estará a punto de estallar de ira. Cada vez que un grupo sea arrojado a él, los ángeles guardianes del infierno les preguntarán: «¿Acaso no recibisteis a ningún amonestador (que os advirtiera del castigo de Al-lah)?».
arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: takādu tamayyazu mina al-ghayẓi kullamā ul'qiya fīhā fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhā alam yatikum nadhīrun
